resources.string:
Home screen: Displays scrolling list of recent activity, storage space info, and a static footer with playback controls

Technical hurdles: Create a navigation bar, always exit app when pressing back from home screen like Google Play Music, create media player controls, access a stored list of recent activity, show storage space info

Solution: DrawerLayout APIs, set clear top flag on home intent, MediaPlayer APIs, SharedPreferences APIs, Fragments, Environment class, Statfs class, File class

Album info screen: Displays album info with option to edit id3 tags and a static footer with playback controls

Technical hurdles: Create media player controls, display album info, make album info editable

Solution: MediaPlayer, MediaStore, mp3agic library

Artist info screen: Displays artist info with option to edit id3 tags and a static bar at the bottom with playback controls

Technical hurdles: Create media player controls, display artist info, edit tags

Solution: MediaPlayer, MediaStore, mp3agic library

Library screen: Displays scrolling list of artists, albums, or songs stored in library 

Technical hurdles: Tab switcher at top, create media player controls, allow editing of tags

Solution: TabHost and/or FragmentTabHost, MediaPlayer, MediaStore, mp3agic library

Lyrics screen: Displays lyrics for currently playing song 

Technical hurdles: Access database of lyrics to display

Solution: Musixmatch lyrics APIs

Settings screen: Configuration options

Technical hurdles: Creating functional options without using View objects

Solution: Preference APIs, PreferenceActivity, PreferenceFragment, SharedPreferences
